about_the_game: Tune in to the music of Master of Orion with the orchestral soundtrack. Dave Govett, composer for the original Master of Orion series, returns with this modernized album featured in the game and printable sheet music for the main themes. Hit play and conquer the stars!
detailed_description: Tune in to the music of Master of Orion with the orchestral soundtrack. Dave Govett, composer for the original Master of Orion series, returns with this modernized album featured in the game and printable sheet music for the main themes. Hit play and conquer the stars!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 240, ATI 4650, Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Video Memory: 512 MB
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.8GHz or AMD Athlon X4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 560, ATI 5870 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Video Memory: 1 GB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan) 
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.2 GHz 
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 240, ATI 4650, Intel Integrated HD4000 or better 
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Video Memory: 512 MB
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.8GHz or AMD Athlon X4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 560, ATI 5870 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Video Memory: 1 GB

short_description: Tune in to the music of Master of Orion with the orchestral soundtrack. Dave Govett, composer for the original Master of Orion series, returns with this modernized album featured in the game and printable sheet music for the main themes. Hit play and conquer the stars!
